name: The Containment Project 2023
description:
Game Description:

A robot is sent out into a deserted world to clear abandoned buildings of zombies. Progress through levels of increasing difficulty while increasing your stats to clear all the sectors! 

Development Team:

Artists: Jim, Harsha

Programmers: Logan, Vanessa

Controls:

WASD to move.

Hold down left click to shoot.

Press e to pick up or purchase powerups.

When the player dies they lose all upgrades and currency.

Temporary power ups last until the player decides to return to lobby.
